feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: RERAPP Save Variant issue
entry.content:
Hello,
We had some issues with RERAPP today where a saved variant was pulling different information in on one person"s computer which was different from the details which were saved on the other users computer. Specifically, a random contract number previously entered in contract field of RERAPP was being pulled into the variant when it was ran by the 2nd employee.

We don"t understand why RERAPP pulling previously run contract information as default when we try to execute it with variant. Please advise.

Thanks,

 

Jayant Patel

entry.title: Exporting reports to Excel
entry.content: Since we are on SAP S4H some reports are not able to export to Excel. Here is a concrete example of that: S_ALR_87012277 in GUI but the same issue is via Fiori. Can someone guide a way for me. With ECC this was simpler

entry.title: Timestamp incorect format in all standard tables
entry.content:
Hi Sap, 

we have in all systems, Development, Test and Production, the completely wrong timestamp format in all standard tables. I looked for some OSS notes but found nothing related. How can it be corrected in all standard tables?
Thanks in advance

Alex

entry.title: Flexible workflow Steps ID (UUID) table details
entry.content:
Hello Team,

In which table I can find the Flexible workflow Steps ID (UUID) details? I found the workflow ID (UUID) details in SWF_FLEX_PROC table.

Thanks,

Chaitanya

entry.title: SAP OData Services not active - /n/IWFND/MAINT_SERVICE
entry.content:
I am executing the task list SAP_GATEWAY_ACTIVATE_ODATA_SERV is using transaction STC01.

Its throwing error Service: I_AVAILABILITYCHECKTYPEVH_CDS not found / ICF NODE

entry.title: Medical device stock to clinic and traceability for patient billing
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

We have a requirement from our customer who are into medical device manufacturing. The product is shipped to various clinics and hospitals for handover to the patients who are prescribed by the doctor. After the use for prescribed time the device is returned to the company for download of patient data. The invoice is raised after the patient data is downloaded by the company and shared with the clinic, hospital, patient themselves for the services as per any contractual terms (services is the report which is based on data downloaded from the device).

The device is serialized and the same device is used multiple times for different patients after which it becomes non operational and is disposed in controlled environment. (Since the company is FDA regulated)

My question to experts is as follows if someone has come across a similar scenario on any other project.

1) What would be ideal sales process for the product being sent to the hospital or clinic? (Consignment process? - May be too cumbersome for multiple hospitals or clinics to manage in SAP)

2) Once the product is returned back to the company for patient data download what would be the right process to keep track of the device which needs to be then used for a different hospital or patient for reuse? Any suggestions?

3) How to link the billing of the services (report based on download of patient data) with the device and the patient since the device was shipped to hospital or clinic (not directly to patient).

Any suggestion or pointers to any SAP documentation would be appreciated and helpful to find a suitable solution for our customer.

Thanks,

Kartik Shah

entry.title: Why do many power users still prefer SAP GUI over Fiori in S/4HANA?
entry.content:
SAP learner here üëã

As I dig deeper into S/4HANA UX, I keep running into a pattern: even in organizations with a well-set-up Fiori Launchpad, a lot of experienced users still default to SAP GUI. I‚Äôm not trying to start a GUI vs. Fiori war‚Äîgenuinely curious about the practical reasons behind this and what has worked to shift habits

I am looking answers for the following topics: 

  • A concrete task where GUI wins (e.g., ‚ÄúDisplay/Change X,‚Äù ‚ÄúHigh-volume posting,‚Äù ‚ÄúMass edits‚Äù).

  • Why Fiori fell short (speed? feature gap? layout? navigation?)

  • Workarounds or fixes you‚Äôve tried

  • If you‚Äôve successfully moved teams to Fiori, what made the real difference? 

  • Which roles experience the biggest benefits with a switch from GUI to FIORI? Which Roles generally prefer to stay in GUI?

entry.title: Does coding RESERVATION_BADI impact SAP system upgrade?
entry.content:
Hi SAP experts,

Our abaper guys made coding on RESERVATION_BADI to enhance t-code MB22, not copy MB22 program to do an enhancement . I just wondering,  does this method impact SAP system upgrade in the few years later or not ?  Is there any risk we need to know on BADI? Thanks.

entry.title: Is BRF+ integrated with SAP Flexible Workflow for dynamic agent determination?
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community,

I'd like to understand whether SAP Flexible Workflow provides a standard/configurable integration with BRF+ for dynamic agent determination based on business rules, or if the only available approach is to invoke BRF+ through an agent determination BAdI such MMPUR_WORKFLOW_AGENTS_V2?

Any guidance would be appreciated.

Thanks,
Mustafa.

entry.title: NF-e Solution (Brazil) for ARM (Advanced Return Management)
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

Can you please inform if NF-e Solution (Brazil) supports ARM (Advanced Return Management) solution and present us with some documentation/OSS Note on how to make sure that a Billing document is going to be created for all scenarios relevant for NF-e?

Thanks and regards
Melina

entry.title: Automatic Outbound Delivery not created for Advanced Intercompany Stock Transfer
entry.content:
Hello,

I am testing the Advanced Intercompany Stock Transfer scenario.

I have created IC STO with document type NBIC and able to see in Shipping data with delivery type NCC3.

Sales Order has already been automatically created but Outbound delivery is not created automatically even through config. are maintained as per SAP note 2363073 - The system does not create a delivery automatically from a STO.

We are able to create a manual OBD with VL10B and also OBD generated automatically if we modified anything in PO.

Please let me know if i missed anything to create OBD automatically once NBIC PO created

entry.title: SQ01 query with two info structures tables
entry.content:
Hello All,

Can we create SQ01 Query by joining with two info structures S961 and S911? Please confirm.

Also, Please confirm the purpose of S911 and S961 infostructures?

when we try to execute both S911 and S961 infostructures in MCSI with same sales org, plant and material and date -  both reports showing different results. what would be the reason for this? Please confirm.

Thanks in Advance.

Regards, Venkat.

entry.title: Population of field TECHDESC in table USR21
entry.content:
Since recent upgrade to SAP S/4HANA, we have noticed that some workflows are checking for a value in field TECHDESC in table USR21.

In table USR21 field TECHDESC, we have records that are populated with First Name & Last Name, and we have blank records in that field also.

We would like to know what is the data flow path / update mechanism, for the field TECHDESC to get populated with a value?  Is there a link to HR infotype to obtain the person's first name & last name?


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: on S/4HANA, if I use ADT to create custom CDS views, is it keeping the core clean?
entry.content:
Using ADT, if I were to create custom CDS views in S/4HANA on PCE or in S/4HANA on premise so I can create custom data products in SAP BDC, am I still keeping the core clean?   

Thanks.

Regards,

Mel Calucin

entry.title: Not able to edit Purchase requisition due to In Process Externally
entry.content:
Hi,

There are 5 Purchase Requisition IN PH1 system which are converted from Planned orders and now Business is not able to delete or not able to convert in to Purchase Order due to Below Error.

"You cannot edit the PR item.

Message no. MMPUR_REQ_COMMON132

Diagnosis

If you can"t edit the PR item, it"s because its status is one of the following:

¬∑ In Process Externally

¬∑ Rejected Externally "

We have run the correction program from SE38 - RLORD035 and tried to delete the Purchase Requisition but it is not deleting.

Can you please suggest us how we can delete these Purchase Requisitions

entry.title: Advanced Valuation - Impairment - Reconciliation Account
entry.content:
Dear All,

when using the credit risk based impairment in the advanced valuation we can assign the P/L account for the adjustment to be posted however the offsetting account is the reconciliation account form the BP/Customer. Is there an option to assign a deviating recon account instead of the recon from the customer master? 

Many thanks,

Sebastian

entry.title: Hierarchy Set selection in ME21N and ME51N
entry.content:
We have activated Item Hierarchies in Purchasing in development 110.

We have also created set in Manage Model Product Specifications.

We do not have selection option of set which was created in app "Manage Model Product Specifications" to select in ME21N or ME51N.

Reproduce steps:

1. Open ME21N transaction

2. Select create hierarchy set

3. Enter set description

4. Select create hierarchy item.

but not able to select already defined set. (set is defined in Manage Model Product Specifications)

entry.title: Read PDF Information And Display Details in Smart Forms
entry.content:
Hi SAP Team,


We've a customer requirement to read the information from a PDF document which is stored in DMS and display the information in Smart Forms.


The ABAP Team has explored and found no leads so far.


Could you let us know if this can be achieved through standard or any custom solutions?


Regards,


Karthik S
